TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Attachment extends System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase

span.span: Represents an attachment to an email.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于类。The class is used with the class. 所有邮件都包括，其中包含消息的内容。All messages include a , which contains the content of the message. 除了正文中，你可能想要发送的其他文件。In addition to the body, you might want to send additional files. 这些将作为附件发送，而表示为实例。These are sent as attachments and are represented as instances. 若要添加到一封电子邮件附件，将其添加到集合。To add an attachment to a mail message, add it to the collection. 附件内容可以是， ，或文件名称。Attachment content can be a , , or file name. 可以在附件中指定的内容，使用任一构造函数。You can specify the content in an attachment by using any of the constructors. 附件的 MIME 内容类型标头信息都由属性。The MIME Content-Type header information for the attachment is represented by the property. 内容类型标头指定的媒体类型和子类型和任何关联的参数。The Content-Type header specifies the media type and subtype and any associated parameters. 使用来获取与附件关联的实例。Use to get the instance associated with an attachment. MIME Content-disposition 标头由属性。The MIME Content-Disposition header is represented by the property. Content-disposition 标头指定的演示文稿和附件的文件时间戳。The Content-Disposition header specifies the presentation and file time stamps for an attachment. 附件是一个文件的情况下，才发送的 Content-disposition 标头。A Content-Disposition header is sent only if the attachment is a file. 使用属性来获取与附件关联的实例。Use the property to get the instance associated with an attachment. MIME 内容传输编码标头由属性。The MIME Content-Transfer-Encoding header is represented by the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将文件附加到电子邮件。The following code example demonstrates attaching a file to an email message. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的信息类表示 MIME Content-disposition 标头。The information in the class represents the MIME Content-Disposition header. 此标头述 RFC 2183，可用在[ https://www.ietf.org/ ](https://www.ietf.org/)。This header is described in RFC 2183, available at [https://www.ietf.org/](https://www.ietf.org/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取附件，并显示其属性。The following code example gets the for an attachment and displays its properties. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果内容为 ASCII 格式则的字符编码设置为 ASCII。If the content is in ASCII format then the character encoding is set to ASCII. 对于所有其他格式的字符编码设置为 utf-8。For all other formats, the character encoding is set to utf-8. 默认媒体类型为纯文本。The default media type is plain text. 如果内容不是 ASCII 格式的编码为 null，则使用 utf-8 编码。If the content is not in ASCII format and the encoding is null, utf-8 encoding is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于生成此附件的内容类型标头。The property is used in the Content-Type header generated for this attachment. 收到带附件的电子邮件时显示为附件的名称。The is displayed as the attachment’s name when the email with the attachment is received. RFC 2045 5.1 节描述了详细说明的内容类型标头的语法语法。A grammar that details the syntax of the Content-Type header is described in RFC 2045 Section 5.1. RFC 2046 提供有关 MIME 媒体类型和其参数的详细的信息。RFC 2046 provides detailed information about MIME media types and their parameters. 这些 Rfc 位于[ https://www.ietf.org/ ](https://www.ietf.org/)。These RFCs are available at [https://www.ietf.org/](https://www.ietf.org/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示有关附件的信息。The following code example demonstrates how to display information about an attachment. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#19](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#19)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#19)]
